long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Farm Factory is an engaging game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, players take on the role of a farm owner and strive to maximize their profits. The objective is to run a livestock farm that includes chickens, cows, and sheep.

The gameplay revolves around the concept of idle clicking and simulation. Players can add animals to their farm and continuously upgrade various aspects of the farm to enhance their earnings potential. As time progresses, players can witness their farm thriving and generating more income.

One interesting feature of "Farm Factory" is its time constraint. Players have a limited duration of 5 minutes to accumulate as much profit as possible. This time pressure adds an exciting element to the game, as players must strategize and make efficient decisions to optimize their earnings within the given timeframe.

The game can be played for free on the website unblockedgames.ee. Whether you enjoy the challenge of managing a virtual farm or simply want to test your entrepreneurial skills, "Farm Factory" offers an enjoyable experience for players of all ages.

Note: In the pop-up window displays other game links, making it easier for players to quickly access the game by clicking "more games" on the top left of the pop-up window. And on our website https://unblockedgames.ee/
